import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import seaborn as sns #data visualization
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt #data visualization
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer #missing values
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler #scaling
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder #categorical values
import tensorflow #deep learning library
from tensorflow.keras.models import Sequential
from tensorflow.keras.layers import Dense
from tensorflow.keras.layers import Dropout

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))
        
df = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/house-prices-advanced-regression-techniques/train.csv") #read data
source.6c51a336:
#we see that five columns store too many null values, so we drop them. Drop the Id column
df = df.drop(columns=['Id', 'Alley', 'FireplaceQu', 'PoolQC', 'Fence', 'MiscFeature'], axis=1)
print(df.info())
source.f5373c57:
print(df.corr()['SalePrice'].sort_values())
max_thresold = df['SalePrice'].quantile(0.996)
min_thresold = df['SalePrice'].quantile(0.004)
max_thresold2 = df['OverallQual'].quantile(0.996)
min_thresold2 = df['OverallQual'].quantile(0.004)

sns.scatterplot(data=df, x='OverallQual', y='SalePrice')
plt.axhline(y=max_thresold, color='r')
plt.axhline(y=min_thresold, color='r')
plt.show()
source.d992686d:
print(max_thresold2)
print(min_thresold2)
df = df[((df['SalePrice']>min_thresold) & (df['OverallQual']>min_thresold2)) &
        ((df['SalePrice']<max_thresold) & (df['OverallQual']>min_thresold2))] #Outliers drop

sns.scatterplot(data=df, x='OverallQual', y='SalePrice')
plt.axhline(y=max_thresold, color='r')
plt.axhline(y=min_thresold, color='r')
plt.show()
source.96f085a6:
#Some columns store null values, that must be imputed
x_train_floatint = df.select_dtypes(include=[np.float, np.int])
imp = SimpleImputer(missing_values=np.nan, strategy='mean')
imp.fit(x_train_floatint)
x_train_floatint2 = imp.transform(x_train_floatint)

x_train_cat = df.select_dtypes(include=[np.object])
imp = SimpleImputer(missing_values=np.nan, strategy='most_frequent')
imp.fit(x_train_cat)
x_train_cat2 = imp.transform(x_train_cat)

x_train_floatint3 = pd.DataFrame(x_train_floatint2, columns=x_train_floatint.columns)
x_train_cat3 = pd.DataFrame(x_train_cat2, columns=x_train_cat.columns)
df = x_train_floatint3.join(x_train_cat3)

#Checking the info
print(df.info()) #info to start preprocessing
source.0a6d1b94:
x_train = df.drop('SalePrice', axis=1)
y_train = df['SalePrice']
x_train_cat = df.select_dtypes(include=[np.object])

#creating categories for OneEncoder
MSZoning = ['A', 'C (all)', 'FV', 'I', 'RH', 'RL', 'RP', 'RM']
Street = ['Grvl', 'Pave']
LotShape = ['Reg', 'IR1', 'IR2', 'IR3']
LandContour = ['Lvl', 'Bnk', 'HLS', 'Low']
Utilities = ['AllPub', 'NoSewr', 'NoSeWa', 'ELO']
LotConfig = ['Inside', 'Corner', 'CulDSac', 'FR2', 'FR3']
LandSlope = ['Gtl', 'Mod', 'Sev']
Neighborhood = ['Blmngtn', 'Blueste','BrDale','BrkSide', 'ClearCr',
                'CollgCr', 'Crawfor', 'Edwards', 'Gilbert',
                'IDOTRR', 'MeadowV', 'Mitchel', 'NAmes', 'NoRidge',
                'NPkVill', 'NridgHt', 'NWAmes', 'OldTown', 'SWISU',
                'Sawyer', 'SawyerW', 'Somerst', 'StoneBr', 'Timber',
                'Veenker']
Condition1 = ['Artery', 'Feedr', 'Norm', 'RRNn', 'RRAn',
              'PosN', 'PosA', 'RRNe', 'RRAe']
Condition2 = Condition1
BldgType = ['1Fam', '2fmCon', 'Duplex', 'Twnhs', 'TwnhsE', 'TwnhsI']
HouseStyle = ['1Story', '1.5Fin', '1.5Unf', '2Story', '2.5Fin',
              '2.5Unf', 'SFoyer', 'SLvl']
RoofStyle = ['Flat', 'Gable', 'Gambrel', 'Hip', 'Mansard',
             'Shed']
RoofMatl = ['ClyTile', 'CompShg', 'Membran', 'Metal', 'Roll',
            'Tar&Grv', 'WdShake', 'WdShngl']
Exterior1st = ['AsbShng', 'AsphShn', 'BrkComm', 'BrkFace',
               'CBlock', 'CemntBd', 'HdBoard', 'ImStucc',
               'MetalSd', 'Other', 'Plywood', 'PreCast',
               'Stone', 'Stucco', 'VinylSd', 'Wd Sdng',
               'WdShing']
Exterior2nd = Exterior1st + ['Brk Cmn', 'CmentBd' ,'Wd Shng']
MasVnrType = ['BrkComm', 'BrkFace', 'CBlock', 'None', 'Stone', 'BrkCmn']
ExterQual = ['Ex', 'Gd', 'TA', 'Fa', 'Po']
ExterCond = ExterQual
Foundation = ['BrkTil', 'CBlock', 'PConc', 'Slab', 'Stone',
              'Wood']
BsmtQual = ['Ex','Gd', 'TA', 'Fa', 'Po','NA']
BsmtCond = BsmtQual
BsmtExposure = ['Gd', 'Av', 'Mn', 'No', 'NA']
BsmtFinType1 = ['GLQ', 'ALQ', 'BLQ', 'Rec', 'LwQ', 'Unf', 'NA']
BsmtFinType2 = BsmtFinType1
Heating = ['Floor', 'GasA', 'GasW', 'Grav', 'OthW', 'Wall']
HeatingQC = ExterQual
CentralAir = ['N', 'Y']
Electrical = ['SBrkr', 'FuseA', 'FuseF', 'FuseP', 'Mix']
KitchenQual = ExterQual
Functional = ['Typ', 'Min1', 'Min2', 'Mod', 'Maj1', 'Maj2',
              'Sev', 'Sal']
GarageType = ['2Types', 'Attchd', 'Basment', 'BuiltIn', 'CarPort',
              'Detchd', 'NA']
GarageFinish = ['Fin', 'RFn' ,'Unf', 'NA']
GarageQual = BsmtQual
GarageCond = BsmtQual
PavedDrive = ['Y', 'P', 'N']
SaleType = ['WD', 'CWD', 'VWD', 'New', 'COD', 'Con', 'ConLw',
            'ConLI', 'ConLD', 'Oth']
SaleCondition = ['Normal', 'Abnorml', 'AdjLand', 'Alloca', 'Family',
                 'Partial']

enc = OneHotEncoder(categories=[MSZoning, Street, LotShape, LandContour,
                                Utilities, LotConfig, LandSlope, Neighborhood,
                                Condition1, Condition2, BldgType, HouseStyle,
                                RoofStyle, RoofMatl, Exterior1st, Exterior2nd,
                                MasVnrType, ExterQual, ExterCond, Foundation,
                                BsmtQual, BsmtCond, BsmtExposure, BsmtFinType1,
                                BsmtFinType2, Heating, HeatingQC, CentralAir,
                                Electrical, KitchenQual, Functional, GarageType,
                                GarageFinish, GarageQual, GarageCond, PavedDrive,
                                SaleType, SaleCondition], sparse=False)
x_train_cat = enc.fit_transform(x_train_cat)
df_cat = pd.DataFrame(x_train_cat)
x_train_floatint = df.select_dtypes(include=[np.float, np.int])
x_new_train = x_train_floatint.join(df_cat)
x_new_train = x_new_train.drop(columns=['SalePrice'])

print(x_new_train.info(verbose=True))
source.b0ece2d6:
#Building the model
with tensorflow.device('/gpu:0'):
    model = Sequential()
    model.add(Dense(300, activation='relu', input_shape=(x_new_train.shape[1],)))
    model.add(Dropout(0.2, input_shape=(x_new_train.shape[1],))) #regularisation
    model.add(Dense(300, activation='relu', input_shape=(x_new_train.shape[1],)))
    model.add(Dropout(0.2, input_shape=(x_new_train.shape[1],)))
    model.add(Dense(300, activation='relu', input_shape=(x_new_train.shape[1],)))
    model.add(Dense(1))
    model.compile(loss='mse', optimizer='adam', metrics=['mae'])
    model.fit(x_new_train, y_train, epochs=100, verbose=0)
source.5c5e85fa:
test_df = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/house-prices-advanced-regression-techniques/test.csv")
test_df = test_df.drop(columns=['Id', 'Alley', 'FireplaceQu', 'PoolQC', 'Fence', 'MiscFeature'], axis=1)

x_test_floatint = test_df.select_dtypes(include=[np.float, np.int])
imp = SimpleImputer(missing_values=np.nan, strategy='mean')
imp.fit(x_test_floatint)
x_test_floatint2 = imp.transform(x_test_floatint)

scaler = StandardScaler()
x_test_floatint2 = scaler.fit_transform(x_test_floatint2)

x_test_cat = test_df.select_dtypes(include=[np.object])
imp = SimpleImputer(missing_values=np.nan, strategy='most_frequent')
imp.fit(x_test_cat)
x_test_cat2 = imp.transform(x_test_cat)

x_test_floatint3 = pd.DataFrame(x_test_floatint2, columns=x_test_floatint.columns)
x_test_cat3 = pd.DataFrame(x_test_cat2, columns=x_test_cat.columns)
test_df = x_test_floatint3.join(x_test_cat3)

x_test = test_df
x_test_floatint = x_test.select_dtypes(include=[np.float, np.int])
x_test_cat = x_test.select_dtypes(include=[np.object])
x_test_cat = enc.fit_transform(x_test_cat)
test_df_cat = pd.DataFrame(x_test_cat)
x_new_test = x_test_floatint.join(test_df_cat)

scaler = StandardScaler()
x_new_test = scaler.fit_transform(x_new_test)

print(test_df.info())
source.a4041af9:
off_test = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/house-prices-advanced-regression-techniques/sample_submission.csv")
mse, mae = model.evaluate(x_new_test, off_test, verbose=0)
print("MSE - ", mse)
